thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com | 13 de 698
thread.title: Alwyn

author: Alwyn
title: Alwyn
text: The service is always fast and friendly and the cars are newish and always reliable. Usually the depots are either on or not far from the airports with fairly regular shuttle buses. Goldcar offers good value so don't be put off by the low prices. The web site as now started to offer the top up insurance up front rather that over the counter on collection. I think this is a lot better as it allows you to decide when you book.
